answer:
QUESTION

Can I purchase a land from the heirs of a person who (died) was giving loans on interest basis, I afraid that this land might have acquired from the income of that interest business.  Pls reply is it halal for me?

 

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is permissible for you to purchase this land.

(Fatāwa Hindiyyah, Vol.3, Pg. 3, Rashīdiyyah)[1]

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā

[1] وأما شرائط النفاذ فنوعان أحدهما الملك أو الولاية(الفتاوى الهندية،الباب الاول في تعريف البيع)
